member.name: D2D1_ARC_SIZE
member.summary: Specifies whether an arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SIZE.D2D1_ARC_SIZE_SMALL
member.summary: An arc's sweep should be 180 degrees or less.

member.name: D2D1_ARC_SIZE.D2D1_ARC_SIZE_LARGE
member.summary: An arc's sweep should be 180 degrees or greater.
